title: The Stonecutter
description: When a poor stonecutter finds himself dissatisfied with his simple life, he makes a series of wishes that are granted by the spirit of the mountain. Although each wish is granted, the stonecutter is still not content. The Stonecutter is the retelling of a traditional Japanese folktale that is supported with vibrant and beautiful illustrations. The book can also be used to teach students how to retell and identify characters, setting, and plot.
meta: emperor, Japan, merchange, spirit, stonecutter, wept
Story Elements : Identify characters, setting, and plot
Short Vowels : Identify and use the short vowel i
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency words day, he, one
